page.title: 09SCHOOLS
page.content: {Primary Education:-}From 5 to 11 years the children attend the Meadow Primary School in Balsham. Small village schools in West Wratting and West Wickham were closed in 1972 when this modern school opened. A coach is provided by the local education authority which is based in Cambridge. {Secondary Education:- }From 11 to 16 years children go to the village college in Linton. A bus is provided. It is a mixed comprehensive school which currently turns out average or above average numbers of pupils with 5-9 O level passes. (9 is the maximum number permitted to be taken at once by this school.) {Further Education:- }At 16 those children wishing to continue their education have to go into Cambridge where there is a range of colleges.
